mapper.select: select a.instance_id instanceId, a.act_id id, a.act_code code, a.act_name name, a.act_category actType from papla_wf_run_ins_act_state st,papla_wf_deploy_acts a where st.act_id = a.act_id and st.instance_id = #{instanceId} and st.act_state in ('completed','running') and a.act_category in ('Notice','Countersign') order by st.end_date

select a.instance_id instanceId, a.act_id id, a.act_code code, a.act_name name, a.act_category actType from papla_wf_run_ins_act_state st, papla_wf_deploy_acts a where st.act_id = a.act_id and st.instance_id = #{instanceId} and st.act_state = 'completed' and a.act_category in ('Notice','Countersign') and st.IS_LAST_STATUS = 'Y' order by st.end_date

select a.instance_id instanceId,a.act_id id,a.act_code code,a.act_name name,a.act_category actType from papla_wf_run_ins_act_state st, papla_wf_deploy_acts a where st.act_id = a.act_id and st.instance_id = #{instanceId} and st.act_state = 'running' and a.act_category in ('Notice','Countersign') order by st.end_date

select DISTINCT ui.USER_ID , ui.USER_NAME , ui.EMP_ID , ui.EMP_NAME from papla_wf_run_ins_task task,papla_wf_user_info ui,papla_wf_run_ins_act_state state where task.assign_user = ui.user_id and task.act_id = state.act_id and task.instance_id = state.instance_id and task.act_id = #{id} and task.instance_id = #{instanceId} and task.task_effective = 'Y' and ((state.act_state = 'completed' and task.close_cause != 'countersign') or state.act_state = 'running') and task.create_type != 'consult' and task.create_type != 'copyto'

select t.queue_id, t.instance_code, t.act_code, t.orderby, t.node_name, t.task_title, t.approver, t.approve_status, t.create_dt, t.create_by, t.update_by, t.update_dt from papla_wf_run_ins_act_queue t where t.act_code = #{actCode} and t.instance_code = #{insCode} and t.approve_status = 'running'

select t.queue_id, t.instance_code, t.act_code, t.orderby, t.node_name, t.task_title, t.approver, t.approve_status, t.create_dt, t.create_by, t.update_by, t.update_dt from papla_wf_run_ins_act_queue t where t.act_code = #{actCode} and t.instance_code = #{insCode} and t.approve_status = 'closed' and t.orderby = (SELECT MIN(A.ORDERBY) FROM papla_wf_run_ins_act_queue A WHERE A.INSTANCE_CODE = #{insCode} AND A.ACT_CODE = #{actCode} AND A.approve_status = 'closed')
select wu.user_id userId, wu.user_name userName, wu.emp_id empId, wu.emp_code empCode, wu.emp_name empName from papla_wf_user_info wu where wu.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT WU.USER_ID, WU.USER_NAME, WU.EMP_ID, WU.EMP_CODE, WU.EMP_NAME FROM papla_wf_run_ins_act_queue T, WU WHERE T.APPROVER = WU.USER_ID+ AND T.INSTANCE_CODE = #{insCode} AND T.ACT_CODE = #{actCode} AND T.ORDERBY = (SELECT MIN(A.ORDERBY) FROM papla_wf_run_ins_act_queue A WHERE A.INSTANCE_CODE = #{insCode} AND A.ACT_CODE = #{actCode})
